title: Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform
description:
Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform

Created attachment 25997 [details]NioEndpoint.java and simple web application

Sometimes, the server's CPU reaches 100% and remains at 100% until the server is restarted. This issue has been reproduced with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, and 1.6.021. It seems to be a duplicate of issue: Bug 46373. The Jetty team has fixed a similar problem: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel.

I added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.
OB: Server's CPU reaches 100% and remains at 100% until the server is restarted.
EB: The server's CPU usage should not reach 100% and should not require a restart.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, or 1.6.021.
2. Start the server.
3. Observe the CPU usage reaching 100%.
4. Restart the server to resolve the issue.
